item.title: Setting Up the Sun Wireless Toolkit, version 2.5.2
item.description: Setting Up the Sun Wireless Toolkit, version 2.5.2 Below are the steps I took for installing the Sun WTK, on a Windows XP virtual machine. The virtual machine part might not be needed, though I haven’t tried this yet. VirtualBox and Windows XP Obviously, you’re going to need an installation CD. (you should get one by your own, but if you really want a link, “WinXPProSP3x86” on IA) You will also have to set up a new VM.
